m_szDocSumamry: Home / Nuclear Basics / Electricity generation - what are the options? Electricity generation - what are the options? Electricity is vital to modern life. It powers our lights and appliances at home. It powers many industry processes. It is used to power trains and to charge electric vehicles. Globally, electricity use is rising rapidly as new major economies develop in places such as China and India.
